meanings.definition: To throw out of a window.
meanings.sent1: He defenestrates the ball out of the window.
meanings.sent2: She defenestrates the old furniture when cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat defenestrates the toy mouse for fun.
meanings.sent4: In frustration, he defenestrates his computer out the window.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind defenestrates the leaves from the tree branches.

meanings.sent1: The boss defenestrates the idea without considering it.
meanings.sent2: She defenestrates employees who do not meet expectations.
meanings.sent3: The teacher defenestrates the incorrect answers quickly.
meanings.sent4: The storm defenestrates any doubts about the severity of the weather.
meanings.sent5: The sudden noise defenestrates his concentration during the meeting.
